name: WorldCraft 3D
description:
WorldCraft: Craft Exploration Lite survival: is a new Survival craft games. Create your perfect buildings or cities with unlimited sources. Invite your friends and make your world together with multiplayer mode.
This world is endless. You can survive in the wild in Survival mode. Or you can show your creativity, have an unlimited amount of resources and build anything you want in Creative mode. Build houses, grow vegetables or to arrange battle!
You may also need to combat against evil monsters in the evening using the weapons mined and crafted in the daylight. Explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, grow plants, raise you own mounts and cast magic spells.
There are no limits to your creativity and imagination! Explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, make traps and grow plants. Tailor clothes and hunt animals for food and resources. Build a shelter to survive cold nights and share your worlds online.
Features:
2 modes: Survival and Creative
Lots of free craft maps, skins.
Multiplayer and a large number of servers
Strong Zombies and other hostile mobs;
A lot of different biomes and the unique topography;
Works over Wi-Fi and 3G, 4G and LET
